law.text: The provisions of KRS 278.700, 278.704, 278.706, 278.708, and 278.710 shall be in addition to, and shall not supplant, any other state or federal law, including the powers available to local governments under the provisions of home rule under KRS 67.080, 67.083, 67.850, 67.922, 67A.060, 67C.101, and 82.082.
law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 7, effective April 10, 2014.
